Earth Magic School

The elemental magic of earth focuses on the manipulation of stone, metal, and the physical properties of the ground.

School Information

Focus Areas

  • Stone
  • Metal
  • Endurance
  • Gravity

Regulation Status: Unregulated Opposing Element: Air
